title: What is the counting number between 4 and 10? - Quora

response.answer_text: The question falsely assumes that there is a unique (“the”) counting number between 4 and 10. In fact, there are five: 5, 6, 7, 8 and 9 (if by “between 4 and 10” you mean strictly greater than 4 and strictly less than 10)
Well, the question should be “What ARE the counting numbers between 4 and 10?” They ARE: 5, 6, 7, 8, 9,
